overview: Colleen E. Harrison is a former IRS Revenue Agent with 17 years of IRS experience as a Revenue Agent. She retired from the Internal Revenue Service in 2006 and created the company known as Harrison Tax, Accounting and Financial Services, Inc. Colleen is the Chief Executive Officer of the company and an IRS Enrolled Agent. As an Enrolled Agent she is authorized by the U. S. government to represent taxpayers before the IRS on all administrative tax matters in all 50 states and U. S. territories. Colleen specializes in tax debt relief and in resolving IRS problems.
